abstract: Bohai Leasing, which is owned by the shipping conglomerate HNA Group, will pay the Irish aircraft leasing firm $31 a share in cash.
snippet: Bohai Leasing, which is owned by the shipping conglomerate HNA Group, will pay the Irish aircraft leasing firm $31 a share in cash.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Bohai Leasing of China plans to buy the Irish aircraft leasing firm Avolon in a deal with worth $7.6 billion, the companies said.

headline.main: Chinese Company to Buy Avolon in $7.6 Billion Deal
